# Summary #

Feature to create / change GUI on demand, and expose it in e.g. `SdfEntityCreator->CreateEntities(sdf::Gui)` along with the other entities.

# Motivation #

Logging playback currently must ignore `<gui>` tag in the recorded SDF file, since the GUI can only be created at startup. This results in behavior like #!/ignitionrobotics/ign-gazebo/pull-requests/181/acropolis-add-logging/activity#comment-94389783 , i.e. the recorded file uses `<engine>ogre2</engine>`, and the playback defaults to `ogre`, which results in the whole scene being a lot brighter.

Summary

Feature to create / change GUI on demand, and expose it in e.g. SdfEntityCreator->CreateEntities(sdf::Gui) along with the other entities.

Motivation

Logging playback currently must ignore <gui> tag in the recorded SDF file, since the GUI can only be created at startup. This results in behavior like #!/ignitionrobotics/ign-gazebo/pull-requests/181/acropolis-add-logging/activity#comment-94389783 , i.e. the recorded file uses <engine>ogre2</engine>, and the playback defaults to ogre, which results in the whole scene being a lot brighter.
